Content: Modules for ships should have random generated falvor texts in the
internal wiki. So they may have a female nickname as a wink to mercedes
and a little bit of text that the module was named after the creators
daugther. Ther also should be some standard sentences enriched with
world lore. So maybe that this thing was developed on [player world
with high research output]. The statistics should also go into a flavor
text, so high kinetic damage leads to a phrase in the internal wiki.
